actions.text: Resolution Agreed to in House by Unanimous Consent.

official_title: A resolution authorizing the speaker to appoint a committee of members to attend the memorial services for the Honorable William R. Cotter.

summary.text: Expresses the condolences of the House of Representatives on the death of the Honorable William R. Cotter, of Connecticut. Authorizes the appointment of a committee to attend the funeral services.

titles.title: A resolution authorizing the speaker to appoint a committee of members to attend the memorial services for the Honorable William R. Cotter.
